titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the University of Chicago Student and Alumni Papers and Ephemera Collectioncirca 1901-2019
titlepage.author: Finding aid prepared by EMS, 1992

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: University of Chicago. Student and Alumni Papers and Ephemera. Collection

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: The Student and Alumni Papers and Ephemera Collection consists of correspondence, class notes, football ticket books, dance cards, freshman orientation programs, diplomas, convocations programs, invitations, brochures from various convocation activities, and other materials related to student life at the University of Chicago. The collection also includes alumni reminiscences and class reunion materials.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: University of Chicago. Student and Alumni Papers and Ephemera. Collection, [Box #, Folder #], Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago.

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: The Student and Alumni Papers and Ephemera Collection consists of correspondence, class notes, football ticket books, dance cards, freshman orientation programs, diplomas, convocations programs, invitations, brochures from various convocation activities, and other materials related to student life at the University of Chicago. The collection also includes alumni reminiscences and class reunion materials.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Resources
relatedmaterial.p: The following related resources are located in the Department of Special Collections:
